content.html: Just back from a holiday in Cyprus. Amazing to see how well the NHS vaccine QR code worked. Every museum, restaurant, bar, and hotel we went to scanned it - and it worked 100% of the time. Most places also verified that the name it displayed matched our passports.
content.value:
Just back from a holiday in Cyprus. Amazing to see how well the NHS vaccine QR code worked.
Every museum, restaurant, bar, and hotel we went to scanned it - and it worked 100% of the time.
Most places also verified that the name it displayed matched our passports.
